metadata.titleEn: Multi-frequency and multi-angular ground-based microwave radiometer and surface parameters experimental data for cropland in 2017
metadata.titleCn: 多频多角度地基微波辐射计及地表参量观测数据集（农田，2017）
metadata.description:
This data set was collected in summer 2017 during the ground-based microwave radiometry experiment, which is part of the Soil Moisture Experiment in the Luan River (SMELR). The experiment site is located in Duolun County, Inner Mongolia (116.47°E, 42.18°N, at 1269 m in altitude). The data set contains three parts, namely brightness temperature data, soil data and vegetation data. The microwave brightness temperature data was observed by a vehicle-mounted dual-polarized multi-frequency radiometer (RPG-6CH-DP), including the horizontal (H) and vertical (V) polarization brightness temperatures at L-, C- and X-bands. The brightness temperature data were acquired from 30° to 65° with an interval of 2.5°, and the time resolution is 0.5 hours. Soil data contains 5 layers of soil moisture and soil temperature (2.5 cm, 10 cm, 20 cm, 30 cm, 50 cm) over three croplands (corn, oats, and buckwheat), with sampling intervals of 10 minutes. The soil data also contains soil surface roughness, rainfall, irrigation flags, and soil texture. Vegetation data contains leaf area index, plant height, vegetation water content, etc.
The experimental period lasted from July 19 to August 30, 2017, and it provided important data for the land surface microwave radiation modeling and validation, as well as the development of soil moisture retrieval algorithms.
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集来源于滦河流域土壤水分遥感试验中的多频多角度地基微波辐射观测试验，试验地点位于内蒙古自治区多伦县 (42.18°N, 116.47°E)，数据获取于2017年。数据集共包含三个部分，即亮温数据、土壤数据和植被数据。微波亮温数据由RPG-6CH-DP车载微波辐射计观测得到，涵盖三种农作物 (玉米、莜麦和荞麦)，包括三个微波波段 (L, C和X)的水平和垂直极化亮温，观测入射角变化范围为30-65° (2.5°间隔)，时间分辨率为0.5小时。土壤数据包含了三种农作物土壤的5层土壤水分和土壤温度 (2.5 cm, 10 cm, 20 cm, 30 cm, 50 cm)，采样间隔为10分钟；土壤数据还包括地表粗糙度、降雨量、灌溉标记和土壤质地。植被数据包括叶面积指数、植株高度、植被含水量等。
试验观测时间从2017年7月19日持续到8月30日，其所涵盖的不同农作物的多频多角度微波亮温及土壤和植被等相关配套数据为陆表微波辐射建模与验证、土壤水分反演算法发展和验证提供了重要资料。
metadata.instructions:
The data file is saved in xlsx format and is named as: DuolunExp+ '_ParaName'. 'ParaName' represents the abbreviation of the observed parameter. For example, the brightness temperature is named as 'DuolunExp_TB.xlsx', the soil data set is named as 'DuolunExp_Soil.xlsx' and the vegetation data is named as 'DuolunExp_Veg.xlsx'. 
Data reading method: The data set can be directly opened  with Excel.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名为： DuolunExp+'_ParaName'，'ParaName'表示观测参数简称，观测数据集以xlsx格式保存，如亮温数据集命名为'DuolunExp_TB.xlsx',  土壤数据集命名为'DuolunExp_Soil.xlsx'，植被数据集命名为'DuolunExp_Veg.xlsx'。
数据读取方法：该数据集可以直接使用Excel打开。

background: Soil moisture (SM) is a vital variable in hydrological, biological and geochemical processes, and it plays an important role in energy exchange between land surfaces and the atmosphere. Eﬃcient SM monitoring can support various applications, such as crop growth monitoring, drought assessment, flood warning, evaporation estimation, and numerical weather forecasting. Unlike traditional manual in situ measurements, passive microwave remote sensing has a great advantage in estimating the surface SM at a global or regional scale. Among the diﬀerent wavelengths of microwave sensors, L-band radiometry is one of the most eﬀective techniques for monitoring the SM due to its proper penetration into vegetation and soil layers. Currently, satellites carrying the L-band radiometer include the Soil Moisture and Ocean Salinity (SMOS) mission and the Soil Moisture Active Passive (SMAP) mission. The SMOS mission launched in November 2009 is the first mission to map global SM by using L-band observations. SMOS has multi-angular observation capability, which can provide more information about surface microwave radiation. The SMAP mission was launched in January 2015, which incorporated a radar and a radiometer. The mission concept is to combine the complementary attributions of the radar and radiometer observations to enhance the resolution of SM.
research objective: With the new development of potential satellite missions, it is important to evaluate existing soil moisture retrieval algorithms, which will greatly contribute to the improvement of current soil moisture products and the development of new methodologies. This paper compared the performance of four well-known soil moisture retrieval algorithms with L-band radiometry at fixed incidence angles, including the single channel algorithm at horizontal polarization (SCA-H), the single channel algorithm at vertical polarization (SCA-V), the dual channel algorithm (DCA), and the land parameter retrieval model (LPRM).
challenges: The results showed that the retrieval accuracy of the SCA-H and SCA-V is significantly affected by the input vegetation optical depth, and the calibration of vegetation parameters should be considered in the implementation of the SCA-H and SCA-V. However, its retrieval requires a penalty on parameter constraints since the input brightness temperatures at horizontal and vertical polarization are correlated. The LPRM has a poor performance at incidence angles less than 30°, as it analytically utilizes the polarization difference in the brightness temperature, which is quite small at lower incidence angles.
methods: The experimental data used for evaluation was from the Soil Moisture Experiment in the Luan River (SMELR), which consists of variable angular ground-based and airborne observations covering a wide range of incidence angles (22.5°–55°) at L-band. The microwave radiative transfer models are set to be consistent to guarantee that the four different algorithms are comparable.
dataset: The experimental data used for evaluation was from the Soil Moisture Experiment in the Luan River (SMELR), which consists of variable angular ground-based and airborne observations covering a wide range of incidence angles (22.5°–55°) at L-band.
findings: The results showed that the retrieval accuracy of the SCA-H and SCA-V is significantly affected by the input vegetation optical depth, and the calibration of vegetation parameters should be considered in the implementation of the SCA-H and SCA-V. The DCA does not rely on the auxiliary vegetation information and can also achieve good performance for both the soil moisture and vegetation optical depth. The accuracy of four soil moisture algorithms achieve their best performances at intermediate incidence angles of 40° to 45°, and is slightly degraded when the incident angles increased to larger than 50°, which is contributed to the increasing vegetation effects and depolarization that leads to an information loss. These findings provide quantitative evidence to help understand the differences in various current soil moisture algorithms and further promote the development of new methodologies for future soil moisture missions.
backgroundCn: 土壤湿度（SM）是水文、生物和地球化学过程中的一个重要变量，并在陆地表面与大气之间的能量交换中发挥着重要作用。有效的土壤湿度监测可以支持多种应用，如作物生长监测、干旱评估、洪水预警、蒸发估算和数值天气预报。与传统的手动现场测量相比，被动微波遥感在全球或区域尺度上估计表面土壤湿度方面具有很大优势。在不同波长的微波传感器中，L波段辐射测量是监测土壤湿度的最有效技术之一，因为它能够有效穿透植被和土壤层。目前，携带L波段辐射计的卫星包括土壤湿度与海洋盐度（SMOS）任务和土壤湿度主动被动（SMAP）任务。SMOS任务于2009年11月发射，是第一个通过L波段观测绘制全球土壤湿度的任务。SMOS具有多角度观测能力，可以提供更多关于表面微波辐射的信息。SMAP任务于2015年1月发射，结合了雷达和辐射计。该任务的概念是结合雷达和辐射计观测的互补特性，以提高土壤湿度的分辨率。
research objectiveCn: 随着潜在卫星任务的新发展，评估现有土壤湿度反演算法变得至关重要，这将大大有助于改善当前的土壤湿度产品和新方法的开发。本文比较了四种著名的土壤湿度反演算法在固定入射角下的L波段辐射测量性能，包括水平极化的单通道算法（SCA-H）、垂直极化的单通道算法（SCA-V）、双通道算法（DCA）和土地参数反演模型（LPRM）。
challengesCn: 结果显示，SCA-H和SCA-V的检索精度受到输入植被光学深度的显著影响，因此在实施SCA-H和SCA-V时应考虑植被参数的校准。然而，由于水平和垂直极化的输入亮温相关，其检索需要对参数约束施加惩罚。LPRM在入射角小于30°时表现较差，因为它在分析上利用了亮温的极化差异，而在较低入射角时，这种差异相对较小。
methodsCn: 用于评估的实验数据来自滦河土壤湿度实验（SMELR），该实验包含了覆盖广泛入射角（22.5°–55°）的可变角度地面和空中观测，频率为L波段。微波辐射传输模型被设置为一致，以确保四种不同算法的可比性。
datasetCn: 用于评估的实验数据来自滦河土壤湿度实验（SMELR），该实验包含了覆盖广泛入射角（22.5°–55°）的可变角度地面和空中观测，频率为L波段。
findingsCn: 结果显示，SCA-H和SCA-V的检索精度受到输入植被光学深度的显著影响，因此在实施SCA-H和SCA-V时应考虑植被参数的校准。DCA不依赖于辅助植被信息，也能在土壤湿度和植被光学深度方面取得良好表现。四种土壤湿度算法的准确性在40°到45°的中间入射角度时达到最佳表现，当入射角度增大到50°以上时，准确性略有下降，这主要是由于植被效应和去极化的增加导致信息损失。这些发现提供了定量证据，有助于理解当前各种土壤湿度算法之间的差异，并进一步推动未来土壤湿度任务新方法的发展。

background: Due to the success of the SMOS (Soil Moisture and Ocean Salinity) and SMAP (Soil Moisture Active Passive) missions, new satellite missions are on the horizon. The current and future missions can benefit from investigations that seek to improve retrieval algorithms that quantitatively map global soil moisture and vegetation optical depth (tau) from Earth’s microwave emissions.
research objective: In this study, we explore multi-angular and multi-frequency approaches for the retrieval of soil moisture and vegetation tau, considering the payload configurations of current and future satellite missions (such as the Copernicus Imaging Microwave Radiometer, the Water Cycle Observation Mission, and the Terrestrial Water Resources Satellite) using a new set of ground observations.
challenges: It is affirmed that increasing the number of observation channels could make the soil moisture retrieval more robust, but might also limit the retrieval performance, as the probability that the model estimations will not match the observations is increased.
methods: Two ground-based microwave radiometry datasets collected in Inner Mongolia during the Soil Moisture Experiment in the Luan River from July to August 2017 (cropland) and August to September 2018 (grassland) are used for this study. A multi-channel collaborative algorithm (MCCA) is developed based on the two-component version of the omega-tau model, which utilizes information from collaborative channels expressed as an analytical form of brightness temperature at the core channel to rule out the parameters to be retrieved.
dataset: Two ground-based microwave radiometry datasets collected in Inner Mongolia during the Soil Moisture Experiment in the Luan River from July to August 2017 (cropland) and August to September 2018 (grassland) are used for this study.
findings: Results of soil moisture retrieval show that the multi-angular approach used by the MCCA generally has a better performance, unbiased root mean square difference (ubRMSD) varying from 0.028 cm³/cm³ to 0.037 cm³/cm³, than the multi-frequency approach (ubRMSD from 0.028 cm³/cm³ to 0.089 cm³/cm³) for the corn field. Except for in the C- & X-band combination, the multi-frequency approach used by the MCCA performs better (ubRMSD from 0.018 cm³/cm³ to 0.023 cm³/cm³) than the multi-angular version (ubRMSD from 0.026 cm³/cm³ to 0.034 cm³/cm³) for the grass field due to reduced vegetation effects for this type of cover. This study provides new insights into the design of potential satellite missions to improve soil moisture retrieval. A satellite with simultaneous multi-angular and multi-frequency observation capabilities is highly recommended.
backgroundCn: 由于SMOS（土壤湿度和海洋盐度）和SMAP（土壤湿度主动被动）任务的成功，新的卫星任务正在筹备中。目前和未来的任务可以从研究中受益，这些研究旨在改进检索算法，以定量映射地球微波辐射下的全球土壤湿度和植被光学深度（tau）。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们探讨了多角度和多频率方法用于土壤湿度和植被光学厚度的获取，考虑了当前和未来卫星任务（如哥白尼成像微波辐射计、水循环观测任务和陆地水资源卫星）的有效载荷配置，并使用了一组新的地面观测数据。
challengesCn: 增加观测通道的数量可以使土壤湿度的检索更加稳健，但也可能限制检索性能，因为模型估计与观测不匹配的概率增加。
methodsCn: 在2017年7月至8月的土壤湿度实验期间，内蒙古收集了两个基于地面的微波辐射测量数据集（农田），以及在2018年8月至9月的草地数据集。基于两组件版本的omega-tau模型，开发了一种多通道协同算法（MCCA），该算法利用协同通道的信息，以亮度温度的解析形式表达核心通道，从而排除需要检索的参数。
datasetCn: 在2017年7月至8月的土壤湿度实验期间，在内蒙古收集的两个地面微波辐射计数据集（农田）和2018年8月至9月（草地）用于本研究。
findingsCn: 土壤湿度检索结果显示，MCCA使用的多角度方法通常表现更好，无偏根均方差（ubRMSD）在0.028 cm³/cm³到0.037 cm³/cm³之间，而多频率方法的ubRMSD在0.028 cm³/cm³到0.089 cm³/cm³之间，适用于玉米田。除了C波段和X波段组合外，MCCA使用的多频率方法在草地上表现更好（ubRMSD在0.018 cm³/cm³到0.023 cm³/cm³之间），而多角度版本的ubRMSD在0.026 cm³/cm³到0.034 cm³/cm³之间，这主要是由于这种覆盖类型的植被效应减弱。本研究为潜在卫星任务的设计提供了新的见解，以改善土壤湿度检索。强烈建议设计一颗具有同时多角度和多频率观测能力的卫星。

Verification.QuestionCn: 是否有在滦河土壤湿度实验中收集的数据集，用于评估土壤湿度检索算法？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: For soil moisture retrieval, does the use of multi-angular or multi-frequency approaches generally yield better performance in cropland areas according to recent ground-based observations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 对于土壤湿度的获取，基于最近的地面观测，多角度或多频率的方法在农田区域通常能提供更好的性能吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: In the context of soil moisture monitoring, is L-band radiometry preferred due to its penetration into vegetation and soil, its global observation capability, or its ability to integrate with other satellite missions?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在土壤湿度监测的背景下，L波段辐射测量因其对植被和土壤的穿透能力、全球观测能力或与其他卫星任务的集成能力而被优先考虑？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: L-band radiometry is preferred due to its penetration into vegetation and soil.
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: L波段辐射测量因其对植被和土壤的穿透能力而受到青睐。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges in using microwave radiometry for soil moisture retrieval?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 使用微波辐射计进行土壤湿度提取的主要挑战是什么？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: retrieval accuracy, input vegetation optical depth, calibration of vegetation parameters, multi-channel observation models
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 检索精度、输入植被光学深度、植被参数校准、多通道观测模型

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: When do experimental observations usually take place for collecting data on soil moisture and related parameters in agricultural fields?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在农业田地中，收集土壤湿度和相关参数的数据的实验观察通常在什么时候进行？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to capture soil moisture and vegetation optical depth in agricultural settings?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于捕获农业环境中土壤湿度和植被光学深度的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used in agricultural settings is the use of a multi-frequency multi-angular ground-based microwave radiometer, such as the RPG-6CH-DP, which captures brightness temperature data over different incidence angles and polarizations for crops like corn, oats, and buckwheat.
Example.AnswerCn: 在农业环境中使用的一种数据收集方法是使用多频多角度的地面微波辐射计，例如RPG-6CH-DP，它能够在不同的入射角和极化下捕获玉米、燕麦和荞麦等作物的亮温数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered in soil moisture retrieval algorithms using microwave radiometry?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用微波辐射测量法进行土壤湿度检索算法时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge encountered in soil moisture retrieval algorithms is the significant effect of input vegetation optical depth on the retrieval accuracy of certain algorithms, such as the SCA-H and SCA-V, which necessitates careful calibration of vegetation parameters.
Example.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度反演算法面临的一个挑战是输入的植被光学深度对某些算法（如SCA-H和SCA-V）的反演精度有显著影响，这需要对植被参数进行仔细校准。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that includes multi-angular and multi-frequency observations for soil moisture research?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含多角度和多频率观测的土壤湿度研究数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is the one collected during the Soil Moisture Experiment in the Luan River, which consists of variable angular ground-based and airborne observations covering a range of incidence angles at L-band, and is used for evaluating soil moisture retrieval algorithms.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子是Luan河土壤湿度实验中收集的数据，该数据集包含了在L波段下，覆盖一系列入射角的可变角度地面和空中观测，用于评估土壤湿度反演算法。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific features of the vegetation data are critical for soil moisture retrieval algorithms?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 植被数据的哪些特征对土壤湿度提取算法至关重要？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: leaf area index, plant height, vegetation water content
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 叶面积指数，植株高度，植被含水量

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the main challenges faced in using L-band radiometry for soil moisture retrieval, and how are they addressed?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用L波段辐射计进行土壤湿度提取面临的主要挑战是什么，以及如何解决这些挑战？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: impact of vegetation optical depth on retrieval accuracy, correlation between input brightness temperatures at different polarizations
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 植被光学深度对检索精度的影响，不同极化下输入亮温之间的相关性。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many microwave frequency bands are used in the ground-based radiometry data collection?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在地面辐射计数据收集中使用了多少个微波频段？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the range of incidence angles covered by the experimental data used for evaluating soil moisture retrieval algorithms?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于评估土壤湿度反演算法的实验数据覆盖的入射角范围是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many layers of soil moisture and temperature data are collected for each crop type?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 每种作物类型收集多少层土壤湿度和温度数据？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the concept of 'soil moisture retrieval algorithms' and how are they used in the context of this field?
Definition.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度检索算法的概念是什么，它们在该领域的应用是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Soil moisture retrieval algorithms are computational methods used to infer soil moisture content from microwave remote sensing data. These algorithms analyze brightness temperature measurements collected by radiometers and utilize different models to estimate soil moisture levels. They are critical for interpreting satellite observations and improving the accuracy of soil moisture mapping on a global scale.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度检索算法是用于从微波遥感数据中推断土壤湿度含量的计算方法。这些算法分析由辐射计收集的亮温测量数据，并利用不同的模型来估计土壤湿度水平。它们对于解释卫星观测结果和提高全球土壤湿度制图的准确性至关重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'L-band radiometry' mean in the context of remote sensing for soil moisture monitoring?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在土壤湿度监测的遥感背景下，“L波段辐射计”是什么意思。
Definition.AnswerEn: L-band radiometry refers to the use of microwave sensors that operate in the L-band frequency range (1-2 GHz) to observe and measure natural microwave emissions from the Earth's surface. In soil moisture monitoring, L-band is preferred due to its effective penetration through vegetation and soil layers, allowing for more accurate soil moisture estimations even in areas with moderate vegetation cover.
Definition.AnswerCn: L波段辐射计是指使用在L波段频率范围（1-2 GHz）内工作的微波传感器，观察和测量地球表面的自然微波辐射。在土壤湿度监测中，L波段因其能够有效穿透植被和土壤层而受到青睐，这使得即使在中等植被覆盖的地区，也能更准确地估计土壤湿度。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when using multi-frequency approaches compared to multi-angular approaches in soil moisture retrieval from microwave emissions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在从微波辐射中获取土壤湿度时，使用多频率方法与多角度方法所面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The multi-frequency approach may offer more data channels to improve robustness but can face challenges due to model estimation mismatches with observations, potentially limiting retrieval performance. The multi-angular approach, on the other hand, generally performs better for certain crop types by providing a range of incidence angles, which can help mitigate vegetation effects and depolarization issues that affect information retrieval.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 多频率方法可能提供更多的数据通道以提高鲁棒性，但由于模型估计与观测之间的不匹配，可能面临挑战，从而限制检索性能。另一方面，多角度方法通常对某些作物类型表现更好，因为它提供了一系列入射角，有助于减轻影响信息检索的植被效应和去极化问题。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying principles can be inferred about the effectiveness of multi-frequency and multi-angular microwave radiometry in soil moisture retrieval, considering different vegetation types?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以推断出关于多频率和多角度微波辐射测量在土壤湿度提取中的有效性的基本原则，考虑到不同的植被类型。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The multi-angular approach tends to perform better in corn fields, likely due to the ability to capture variations across angles, while the multi-frequency approach shows improved results in grass fields, indicating that the frequency range can mitigate vegetation effects. This suggests that soil moisture retrieval may benefit from adapting strategies based on vegetation type and using a combination of angles and frequencies to optimize results.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多角度方法在玉米田中表现更好，这可能是由于能够捕捉不同角度的变化，而多频率方法在草地中显示出更好的结果，表明频率范围可以减轻植被影响。这表明，土壤湿度的获取可能会受益于根据植被类型调整策略，并结合角度和频率以优化结果。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do variations in observation angles impact the accuracy of soil moisture retrieval algorithms, and what could this imply about the choice of angles in designing future retrieval models?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 观察角度的变化如何影响土壤湿度提取算法的准确性，这对未来提取模型的角度选择有什么启示？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Retrieval accuracy is optimal at intermediate incidence angles (40° to 45°) but decreases at angles over 50°, likely due to increasing vegetation effects and depolarization. This indicates that future models should consider optimizing observation angles to balance the need for capturing sufficient surface information while minimizing confounding factors like vegetation interference.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 检索精度在中等入射角（40°到45°）时最佳，但在超过50°的角度时下降，这可能是由于植被效应和去极化的增加。这表明未来的模型应考虑优化观测角度，以平衡捕获足够的地表信息与最小化植被干扰等混杂因素的需求。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges do the calibration of vegetation optical depth and brightness temperature correlation present in soil moisture retrieval, and how might these challenges inform improvements in retrieval methodologies?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 植被光学深度和亮度温度相关性的校准在土壤湿度提取中面临哪些挑战，这些挑战又如何为改进提取方法提供信息？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The need for calibration of vegetation parameters affects retrieval algorithms like SCA-H and SCA-V, while the correlation between horizontally and vertically polarized brightness temperatures imposes constraints. Addressing these challenges could involve developing methods to decouple vegetation effects and refine calibration processes, thus enhancing retrieval accuracy and robustness.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 植被参数的校准需求影响了像SCA-H和SCA-V这样的反演算法，而水平和垂直极化亮温之间的相关性则施加了限制。解决这些挑战可能涉及开发方法以解耦植被效应并完善校准过程，从而提高反演的准确性和稳健性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges of accurately retrieving soil moisture using microwave radiometry in agricultural fields?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响农业领域中使用微波辐射测量准确获取土壤湿度的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The retrieval accuracy of soil moisture using microwave radiometry in agricultural fields is significantly affected by the input vegetation optical depth. Calibration of vegetation parameters should be considered due to their influence on the retrieval process. Additionally, the correlation between brightness temperatures at horizontal and vertical polarizations can require penalties on parameter constraints, affecting accuracy.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用微波辐射计在农业领域获取土壤湿度的准确性受到输入植被光学深度的显著影响。应考虑对植被参数进行校准，因为它们对检索过程有影响。此外，水平和垂直极化的亮温之间的相关性可能需要对参数约束施加惩罚，从而影响准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might increasing the number of observation channels in microwave radiometry not always enhance the performance of soil moisture retrieval?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在微波辐射测量中，增加观测通道的数量并不总是能提高土壤湿度提取的性能，原因可能有以下几点：
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: While increasing the number of observation channels could make soil moisture retrieval more robust by providing additional data, it might also limit retrieval performance. This is because the probability that model estimations will not match the observations increases with additional channels, potentially complicating the retrieval process and reducing accuracy.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 增加观测通道的数量可能会通过提供额外的数据使土壤湿度的检索更加稳健，但这也可能限制检索性能。这是因为随着额外通道的增加，模型估计与观测不匹配的概率会增加，从而可能使检索过程变得复杂，降低准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes variability in the performance of soil moisture retrieval algorithms across different incidence angles?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 不同入射角下土壤湿度提取算法性能变异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The performance of soil moisture retrieval algorithms varies across different incidence angles due to factors such as vegetation effects and depolarization. These factors can lead to information loss at larger incidence angles. The accuracy of the algorithms is generally better at intermediate angles of 40° to 45°, while performance tends to degrade at angles larger than 50°.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度检索算法的性能在不同入射角下有所不同，这主要是由于植被效应和去极化等因素。这些因素可能导致在较大入射角下信息的丢失。一般来说，算法在40°到45°的中间角度下表现更好，而在大于50°的角度下性能往往会下降。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of incorporating multiple angular observations into soil moisture retrieval algorithms using microwave radiometry?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将多个角度观测纳入微波辐射测量的土壤湿度反演算法可能产生的结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of multiple angular observations allows for improved retrieval accuracy of soil moisture by providing more comprehensive information about surface microwave radiation. It was found that the accuracy of soil moisture algorithms is best at intermediate incidence angles of 40° to 45°, enhancing the performance by reducing vegetation effects and depolarization that can cause information loss at larger angles.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 多角度观测的使用可以通过提供更全面的地表微波辐射信息来提高土壤湿度的检索精度。研究发现，土壤湿度算法在40°到45°的中间入射角度下准确性最佳，这通过减少植被效应和去极化来增强性能，从而降低在较大角度下可能导致的信息损失。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the inclusion of multi-frequency channels affect the robustness and performance of soil moisture retrieval from microwave emissions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 多频通道的纳入如何影响微波辐射土壤湿度反演的稳健性和性能？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Incorporating multi-frequency channels makes soil moisture retrieval more robust by providing additional data points, although it may also increase the difficulty of matching model estimations with observations. The study found that for certain types of vegetation cover, like grass fields, the multi-frequency approach generally outperformed the multi-angular approach due to reduced vegetation effects.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 引入多频率通道使土壤湿度的获取更加稳健，因为它提供了额外的数据点，尽管这可能会增加模型估计与观测值匹配的难度。研究发现，对于某些类型的植被覆盖，如草地，多频率方法通常优于多角度方法，因为植被效应减少。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What consequences might arise from using ground-based microwave radiometry datasets for evaluating soil moisture retrieval algorithms in different environmental conditions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用地面微波辐射测量数据集评估不同环境条件下的土壤湿度反演算法可能会产生哪些后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing ground-based microwave radiometry datasets enables the assessment of different soil moisture retrieval algorithms across varied environmental conditions, leading to a better understanding of their performance and limitations. This approach provides quantitative evidence that can support the development of new methodologies and improve current soil moisture products, particularly by highlighting the effects of various incidence angles and vegetation types on retrieval accuracy.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用地面微波辐射计数据集可以评估不同土壤湿度反演算法在不同环境条件下的表现，从而更好地理解它们的性能和局限性。这种方法提供了定量证据，可以支持新方法的开发并改善当前的土壤湿度产品，特别是通过突出不同入射角和植被类型对反演精度的影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary intention behind utilizing multi-frequency and multi-angular ground-based microwave radiometry in soil moisture studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 利用多频率和多角度的地面微波辐射测量法进行土壤湿度研究的主要目的是为了提高土壤湿度的测量精度和空间分辨率。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary intention is to improve the accuracy of soil moisture retrieval by taking advantage of the different characteristics of microwave frequencies and angles, which can enhance understanding and development of soil moisture retrieval algorithms and ultimately contribute to better soil moisture products and methodologies.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目的是通过利用微波频率和角度的不同特性来提高土壤湿度提取的准确性，这可以增强对土壤湿度提取算法的理解和开发，并最终有助于更好的土壤湿度产品和方法。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to develop and evaluate multiple soil moisture retrieval algorithms using L-band radiometry?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么使用L波段辐射计开发和评估多种土壤湿度检索算法很重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important to develop and evaluate multiple soil moisture retrieval algorithms using L-band radiometry because it helps assess their performance under various conditions, leading to improvements in current soil moisture products and the development of new methodologies, which are crucial for upcoming satellite missions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 开发和评估多种L波段辐射计土壤湿度反演算法非常重要，因为这有助于在不同条件下评估它们的性能，从而改进当前的土壤湿度产品和开发新方法，这对即将到来的卫星任务至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are followed to collect and process multi-frequency multi-angle ground-based microwave radiometer data for soil moisture and vegetation studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 收集和处理多频率多角度地面微波辐射计数据用于土壤湿度和植被研究的程序包括哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data collection involves using a ground-based microwave radiometer, such as the RPG-6CH-DP, to capture brightness temperatures at different microwave bands (L, C, and X) and polarizations (horizontal and vertical) over a range of incidence angles (30° to 65°) with a temporal resolution of 0.5 hours. The data processing includes monitoring soil moisture and temperature across five soil layers, as well as gathering additional surface roughness, rainfall, irrigation, and soil texture information. Vegetation data such as leaf area index and plant height are also recorded.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集涉及使用地面微波辐射计，例如RPG-6CH-DP，在不同的微波波段（L、C和X）和极化方式（水平和垂直）下，以30°到65°的入射角捕获亮温，时间分辨率为0.5小时。数据处理包括监测五个土壤层的土壤湿度和温度，以及收集额外的地表粗糙度、降雨、灌溉和土壤纹理信息。还记录了植被数据，如叶面积指数和植物高度。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the performance of soil moisture retrieval algorithms evaluated using ground-based observations from microwave radiometry datasets?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度检索算法的性能是如何利用微波辐射数据集中的地面观测进行评估的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The performance of soil moisture retrieval algorithms is evaluated by comparing different algorithms such as SCA-H, SCA-V, DCA, and LPRM using L-band radiometry data. The evaluation involves analyzing the retrieval accuracy across various incidence angles and assessing the impact of vegetation optical depth. This process is supported by consistent microwave radiative transfer models that ensure comparability and calibration of vegetation parameters for algorithm implementation.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度检索算法的性能通过比较不同的算法，如SCA-H、SCA-V、DCA和LPRM，使用L波段辐射计数据进行评估。评估涉及分析在不同入射角下的检索精度，并评估植被光学深度的影响。这个过程得到了稳定的微波辐射传输模型的支持，以确保算法实施中植被参数的可比性和校准。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches are used to enhance soil moisture retrieval accuracy from multi-angular and multi-frequency microwave observations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于提高从多角度和多频率微波观测中土壤湿度检索准确性的研究方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To enhance soil moisture retrieval accuracy, a multi-channel collaborative algorithm (MCCA) is utilized, which incorporates multi-angular and multi-frequency approaches based on the omega-tau model. This method leverages information from multiple observation channels to analytically process brightness temperature data and reduce vegetation effects. The MCCA approach is noted for its better performance in certain field conditions, such as corn and grass fields, by effectively managing the different impacts of vegetation cover on microwave emissions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了提高土壤湿度检索的准确性，采用了一种多通道协作算法（MCCA），该算法基于omega-tau模型，结合了多角度和多频率的方法。该方法利用来自多个观测通道的信息，对亮温数据进行分析处理，以减少植被效应。MCCA方法在某些田间条件下表现更佳，例如玉米和草地，通过有效管理植被覆盖对微波辐射的不同影响。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the use of passive microwave remote sensing to estimate surface soil moisture at a regional scale?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得被动微波遥感能够在区域尺度上估计表层土壤湿度？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Passive microwave remote sensing, particularly L-band radiometry, enables efficient estimation of surface soil moisture at a regional scale. This technique benefits from proper penetration into vegetation and soil layers, providing advantages over traditional manual measurements. The Soil Moisture and Ocean Salinity (SMOS) mission and the Soil Moisture Active Passive (SMAP) mission are examples of satellites utilizing L-band radiometry, offering multi-angular observation capabilities to enhance soil moisture retrieval.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 被动微波遥感，特别是L波段辐射计，能够有效地在区域尺度上估计表层土壤湿度。这项技术由于能够深入植被和土壤层，提供了相较于传统手动测量的优势。土壤湿度与海洋盐度（SMOS）任务和土壤湿度主动被动（SMAP）任务是利用L波段辐射计的卫星示例，提供多角度观测能力以增强土壤湿度的检索。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with calibrating vegetation parameters in soil moisture retrieval algorithms using microwave radiometry?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 使用微波辐射测量法校准土壤湿度检索算法中的植被参数面临哪些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges in calibrating vegetation parameters in soil moisture retrieval algorithms arise from the significant effect of vegetation optical depth on retrieval accuracy. Algorithms such as the single channel algorithm at horizontal and vertical polarizations (SCA-H and SCA-V) require careful calibration of vegetation parameters to mitigate the impact on the accuracy of soil moisture estimates. These challenges necessitate penalty constraints to account for the correlation between horizontal and vertical polarization brightness temperatures.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在土壤湿度反演算法中，校准植被参数面临的挑战源于植被光学深度对反演精度的显著影响。像水平和垂直极化的单通道算法（SCA-H 和 SCA-V）需要对植被参数进行仔细校准，以减轻对土壤湿度估计精度的影响。这些挑战需要引入惩罚约束，以考虑水平和垂直极化亮温之间的相关性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges could arise from increasing the number of observation channels in soil moisture retrieval algorithms?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 增加土壤湿度反演算法中的观测通道数量可能会带来哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Increasing the number of observation channels could make retrievals more robust but also potentially limit performance. This is because the probability that model estimations will not match observations might increase, indicating that a balance must be found between robustness and retrieval accuracy.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 增加观测通道的数量可能会使检索更加稳健，但也可能限制性能。这是因为模型估计与观测不匹配的概率可能会增加，这表明必须在稳健性和检索准确性之间找到平衡。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the retrieval accuracy of soil moisture algorithms degrade at larger incidence angles?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度算法在较大入射角下的检索准确性可能会下降的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The accuracy of soil moisture algorithms tends to degrade at larger incidence angles due to increasing vegetation effects and depolarization, which leads to information loss. This suggests that intermediate incidence angles might provide a more optimal balance for accurate retrievals.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度算法的准确性在较大入射角下往往会降低，这主要是由于植被效应和去极化的增加，导致信息损失。这表明中等入射角可能为准确检索提供了更优的平衡。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the effectiveness of ground-based microwave radiometry data collection methods in improving soil moisture retrieval algorithms?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对基于地面的微波辐射计数据收集方法在改善土壤湿度反演算法方面的有效性进行评估。
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Ground-based microwave radiometry data collection methods are effective in improving soil moisture retrieval algorithms as they allow for the evaluation of different algorithms using variable angular observations. This method provides valuable insights into the performance of retrieval algorithms, especially in understanding the effects of vegetation optical depth and the optimal incidence angles for accurate soil moisture estimation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 基于地面的微波辐射计数据收集方法在改善土壤湿度反演算法方面是有效的，因为它们允许使用不同的角度观测来评估不同的算法。这种方法提供了对反演算法性能的宝贵见解，特别是在理解植被光学深度的影响和准确土壤湿度估计的最佳入射角方面。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the main challenges associated with using multi-frequency approaches for soil moisture data collection, and how might they impact the accuracy of retrieval algorithms?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在使用多频率方法进行土壤湿度数据收集时，主要面临的挑战是什么，这些挑战可能如何影响检索算法的准确性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The main challenges associated with multi-frequency approaches include the potential limitations in retrieval performance due to an increased number of observation channels. This can lead to model estimation inconsistencies with observations. However, for certain types of land cover, such as grass fields, multi-frequency approaches can reduce vegetation effects and enhance retrieval accuracy.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多频率方法面临的主要挑战包括由于观测通道数量增加而可能导致的检索性能限制。这可能导致模型估计与观测之间的不一致。然而，对于某些类型的土地覆盖，例如草地，多频率方法可以减少植被效应并提高检索准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how multi-angular observations improve the accuracy of soil moisture retrieval algorithms.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白多角度观测如何提高土壤湿度检索算法的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Multi-angular observations provide more information about surface microwave radiation, as they capture the brightness temperature at different incidence angles. This approach helps in understanding the effects of vegetation and soil layers on microwave emissions, leading to improved retrieval accuracy for soil moisture algorithms.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 多角度观测提供了关于表面微波辐射的更多信息，因为它们在不同入射角下捕捉亮温。这种方法有助于理解植被和土壤层对微波辐射的影响，从而提高土壤湿度算法的检索精度。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure why increasing the number of observation channels might limit the retrieval performance of soil moisture.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定为什么增加观测通道的数量可能会限制土壤湿度的检索性能。
Assertion.AnswerEn: While additional observation channels can enhance the robustness of soil moisture retrieval, they may also increase the complexity of the model. This complexity can lead to discrepancies between model estimations and observations, potentially limiting the retrieval performance.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 虽然额外的观测通道可以增强土壤湿度提取的稳健性，但它们也可能增加模型的复杂性。这种复杂性可能导致模型估计与观测之间的差异，从而可能限制提取性能。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how ground-based microwave radiometry datasets contribute to the development of new satellite missions for soil moisture monitoring.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解基于地面的微波辐射计数据集如何为土壤湿度监测的新卫星任务的发展做出贡献。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Ground-based microwave radiometry datasets provide valuable insights into the behavior of microwave emissions from soil and vegetation under various conditions. This data is crucial for evaluating and refining soil moisture retrieval algorithms, which ultimately aids in the design and improvement of new satellite missions aimed at global soil moisture monitoring.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 基于地面的微波辐射计数据集提供了关于土壤和植被在不同条件下微波辐射行为的宝贵见解。这些数据对于评估和改进土壤湿度反演算法至关重要，最终有助于新卫星任务的设计和改进，以实现全球土壤湿度监测。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the key methodologies for collecting multi-angular and multi-frequency microwave radiometry data in agricultural settings.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结在农业环境中收集多角度和多频率微波辐射计数据的关键方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve using ground-based microwave radiometry datasets collected with multi-frequency and multi-angular capabilities, as demonstrated in the Soil Moisture Experiment in the Luan River. The data collection includes monitoring at different incidence angles and frequencies, utilizing microwave radiometers to capture brightness temperature across L, C, and X bands for various crops.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用具有多频率和多角度能力的地面微波辐射计数据集，如在滦河土壤湿度实验中所示。数据收集包括在不同入射角和频率下进行监测，利用微波辐射计捕获不同作物在L、C和X波段的亮温。
